summary: A letter from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York to the Metropolitan Detention Center, providing the password for a drive containing discovery materials in the case against Ghislaine Maxwell.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The subject of the criminal case (20 Cr. 330) for which discovery materials are being provided.

persons.name: Audrey Strauss
persons.context: The official sending the letter, providing the password for discovery materials related to Ghislaine Maxwell's case.

locations: Silvio J. Mollo Building, One Saint Andrew's Plaza, New York, New York 10007
Metropolitan Detention Center, 80 29th Street, Brooklyn, NY 11232
keyFacts: The document is a formal communication from the U.S. Attorney's Office regarding the criminal case against Ghislaine Maxwell (case number 20 Cr. 330).
It provides the password ('USAOsdnyl!') for a drive containing discovery materials pertinent to Ghislaine Maxwell's case.
The letter is addressed to the legal department of the Metropolitan Detention Center where Ghislaine Maxwell was likely held.
Audrey Strauss was serving as the Acting United States Attorney for the Southern District of New York at the time.
The document indicates ongoing legal proceedings and discovery sharing in Maxwell's case as of October 2020.
